      • getMaxResolution

        double getMaxResolution​(java.lang.String layer)
        Deprecated.
        Returns the maximum display resolution of the layer, in meters per pixel. Smaller values equate to higher resolutions.
        Returns:
        The maximum display resolution of the layer (or NaN for no maximum).

      • getMinResolution

        double getMinResolution​(java.lang.String layer)
        Deprecated.
        Returns the minimum display resolution of the layer, in meters per pixel. Larger values equate to lower resolutions.
        Returns:
        The minimum display resolution of the layer (or NaN for no minimum).

      • queryFeatures

        GeoPackageFeatureCursor queryFeatures​(java.lang.String layer,
                                      FeatureDataStore.FeatureQueryParameters params)
        Deprecated.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to be queried for features.
        params - The constraints on the features to be selected from the supplied layer (or null for all features).
        Returns:
        A cursor for the features in the supplied layer that satisfy the supplied FeatureQueryParameters.

      • queryFeaturesCount

        int queryFeaturesCount​(java.lang.String layer,
                       FeatureDataStore.FeatureQueryParameters params)
        Deprecated.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to be queried for feature count.
        params - The constraints on the features to be selected from the supplied layer (or null for all features).
        Returns:
        The number of features in the supplied layer that satisfy the supplied FeatureQueryParameters.
